article:
Have you ever heard the story of the four-minute mile? For years people believed that it is impossible for a human being to   _  a mile in less than four minutes until
Roger Banister proved it  _  in 1954.Within one year, 37 runners   _  the belief barrier.And the year after that, 300 other runners did the same thing.
       What happens if you put an animal in a   _  ? Any animal, big or
small, will swim its way through.What happens when someone, who does not know how to swim, falls in deep waters? You   _  .If an animal who has not learned swimming could   _  by swimming, why not you? Because you
believe you will drown while the animal does not.
       These   _  show the power of beliefs.There is no other more   _  force in directing human behavior
than belief.Our beliefs have the power to   _  and to destroy.
       In a way it is our beliefs that determine how much we'll be able to   _  our potential.So pay attention to some of your   _  .Do you believe you are weak in mathematics? Do you believe that other people dislike you?Do you believe life is full of   _  ?
       Belief is not   _  , however.It's nothing but the generalization of a past incident.As a kid, if a dog bit you, you believed all dogs to be   _  .To change certain behavior, identify the beliefs associated with it.Change those beliefs and a new pattern is   _  created.
